languages.text: "Слишком много, чтобы всех перечислять. Техножрецы из инженариума, пустотники с авгуров, бездельники на мостике. Ух, так бы и передавил этих немочей безмозглых! Всех надо застроить, всем внушение сделать, иначе не полетим никуда. Или еще хуже — полетим куда не надо".

"There are too many to list them all. Tech-Priests from the enginarium, voidsmen from the augur decks, the work-shy fools on the bridge. I'd have every last one of them flogged! They all need a wake-up call. They need to be whipped into shape or else this ship'll be going nowhere. Or even worse, it'll go somewhere we don't want it to."
languages.original_text: "Слишком много, чтобы всех перечислять. Техножрецы из инженариума, пустотники с авгуров, бездельники на мостике. Ух, так бы и передавил этих немочей безмозглых! Всех надо застроить, всем внушение сделать, иначе не полетим никуда. Или еще хуже — полетим куда не надо".

traits.locale_text: "There are too many to list them all. Tech-priest from the enginarium, voidsmen from the augur decks, loiterers on the bridge. I would have them all caned! Everybody needs being told what to do, everybody needs to be disciplined before the ship can go anywhere. Or before it goes nowhere, which is worse."

"There are too many to list them all. Tech-priest from the enginarium, voidsmen from the augur decks, loiterers on the bridge. I would have them all caned! Everybody needs being told what to do, everybody needs to be disciplined before the ship can go anywhere. Or before it goes nowhere, which is worse."

"There are too many to list them all. Tech-Priests from the enginarium, voidsmen from the augur decks, loiterers on the bridge. I would have every last one of them flogged! Everybody needs being told what to do, everybody needs to be disciplined before the ship can go anywhere. Or before it goes nowhere, which is much worse."

"There are too many to list them all. Tech-Priests from the enginarium, voidsmen from the augur decks, loiterers on the bridge. I would have every last one of them flogged! Everybody needs being told what to do, everybody needs to be disciplined before the ship can go anywhere. Or before it goes nowhere, which is much worse."

"There are too many to list them all. Tech-Priests from the enginarium, voidsmen from the augur decks, the work-shy fools on the bridge. I'd have every last one of them flogged! They all need a wake-up call. They need to be whipped into shape or else this ship'll be going nowhere. Or even worse, it'll go somewhere we don't want it to."

"There are too many to list them all. Tech-Priests from the enginarium, voidsmen from the augur decks, the work-shy fools on the bridge. I'd have every last one of them flogged! They all need a wake-up call. They need to be whipped into shape or else this ship'll be going nowhere. Or even worse, it'll go somewhere we don't want it to."

languages.text: “那可就太多了，我可没办法全都列出来。包括引擎区那些技术神甫，俄歇甲板那边的虚空人，还有舰桥上那群懒鬼。我真想把这群人挨个拿鞭子抽一顿！这群人真该好好收拾收拾，脑子也该好好上点弦，要不然这艘船哪都去不了。或者更惨，它会带着我们去不想去的地方。”
languages.original_text: "There are too many to list them all. Tech-Priests from the enginarium, voidsmen from the augur decks, the work-shy fools on the bridge. I'd have every last one of them flogged! They all need a wake-up call. They need to be whipped into shape or else this ship'll be going nowhere. Or even worse, it'll go somewhere we don't want it to."

traits.locale_text: “那可就太多了，我可没办法全都列出来。包括引擎区那些技术祭司，俄歇甲板那边的虚空人，还有舰桥上那群懒鬼。我真想把这群人挨个拿鞭子抽一顿！这群人真该好好收拾收拾，脑子也该好好上点弦，要不然这艘船哪都去不了。或者更惨，它会带着我们去不想去的地方。”

languages.text: «Hay demasiados como para enumerarlos a todos. Los tecnosacerdotes del ingeniarium, los expertos en el vacío de las cubiertas de augures, los haraganes del puente... ¡les daría unos cuantos latigazos a todos! Tienen que espabilar urgentemente. O empiezan a hacer su trabajo como es debido o la nave no irá a ninguna parte. O peor, irá justo a donde no queremos que vaya».
languages.original_text: "There are too many to list them all. Tech-Priests from the enginarium, voidsmen from the augur decks, the work-shy fools on the bridge. I'd have every last one of them flogged! They all need a wake-up call. They need to be whipped into shape or else this ship'll be going nowhere. Or even worse, it'll go somewhere we don't want it to."

traits.locale_text: «Hay demasiados como para enumerarlos a todos. Los tecnosacerdotes del ingeniarium, los expertos en el vacío de las cubiertas de augures, los haraganes del puente... ¡les daría unos cuantos latigazos a todos! Tienen que espabilar urgentemente. O empiezan a hacer su trabajo como es debido o la nave no irá a ninguna parte. O peor, irá justo a donde no queremos que vaya».

languages.text: 「大勢いすぎて、全員はあげられませんな。エンジナリウムの技術司祭、スキャナーデッキのヴォイズマン、ブリッジの怠惰な愚か者。ひとり残らず鞭打ちにしてやりたいくらいですよ！全員目を覚まさせる必要があります。鞭で打たないと、この船はどこにも行けなくなるでしょうな。あるいは最悪の場合、望まぬ場所にたどり着くことすらあるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "There are too many to list them all. Tech-Priests from the enginarium, voidsmen from the augur decks, the work-shy fools on the bridge. I'd have every last one of them flogged! They all need a wake-up call. They need to be whipped into shape or else this ship'll be going nowhere. Or even worse, it'll go somewhere we don't want it to."

traits.locale_text: 「大勢いすぎて、全員はあげられませんな。エンジナリウムのテックプリースト、スキャナーデッキのボイドマン、ブリッジの怠惰な愚か者。一人残らず鞭打ちにしてやりたいくらいですよ！みんな目を覚まさせる必要があります。鞭で打たないと、この船はどこにも行けなくなるでしょうな。あるいは最悪、望まない場所にたどり着くことすらあるでしょう」

languages.text: "Das sind zu viele, um sie alle aufzuzählen. Techpriester aus dem Maschinarium, Kinder der Leere von den Augurendecks, das arbeitsscheue Gesindel von der Brücke. Am liebsten würde ich sie alle auspeitschen. Sie brauchen allesamt einen Weckruf. Wenn wir sie nicht in Form prügeln, kommt dieses Schiff nie irgendwo an. Oder schlimmer noch ... wir kommen irgendwo an, wo wir gar nicht hinwollen."
languages.original_text: "There are too many to list them all. Tech-Priests from the enginarium, voidsmen from the augur decks, the work-shy fools on the bridge. I'd have every last one of them flogged! They all need a wake-up call. They need to be whipped into shape or else this ship'll be going nowhere. Or even worse, it'll go somewhere we don't want it to."

traits.locale_text: "Das sind zu viele, um sie alle aufzuzählen. Techpriester aus dem Maschinarium, Kinder der Leere von den Augurendecks, das arbeitsscheue Gesindel von der Brücke. Am liebsten würde ich sie alle auspeitschen. Sie brauchen allesamt einen Weckruf. Wenn wir sie nicht in Form prügeln, kommt dieses Schiff nie irgendwo an. Oder schlimmer noch ... wir kommen irgendwo an, wo wir gar nicht hinwollen."

languages.text: « Ils sont trop nombreux pour vous en dresser la liste complète. Il y a les technoprêtres de l'enginarium, les cosmomarins des ponts réservés aux augures, les tire-au-flanc de la passerelle... Si cela ne tenait qu'à moi, je les ferais tous fouetter ! Franchement, ils ont tous besoin d'un sérieux rappel à l'ordre. S'ils ne se remontent pas les manches, ce vaisseau n'ira nulle part... ou pire encore, il foncera droit vers un endroit qu'on préférerait éviter. »
languages.original_text: "There are too many to list them all. Tech-Priests from the enginarium, voidsmen from the augur decks, the work-shy fools on the bridge. I'd have every last one of them flogged! They all need a wake-up call. They need to be whipped into shape or else this ship'll be going nowhere. Or even worse, it'll go somewhere we don't want it to."

traits.locale_text: « Ils sont trop nombreux pour vous en dresser la liste complète. Il y a les technoprêtres de l'enginarium, les cosmomarins des ponts réservés aux augures, les tire-au-flanc de la passerelle... Si cela ne tenait qu'à moi, je les ferais tous fouetter ! Franchement, ils ont tous besoin d'un sérieux rappel à l'ordre. S'ils ne se remontent pas les manches, ce vaisseau n'ira nulle part... ou pire encore, il foncera droit vers un endroit qu'on préférerait éviter. »

languages.text: "Say say bitmez. Mühendishanedeki Tekno Rahipler, alamet güvertelerindeki uçsuz erleri, köprüdeki kaytarıcı ahmaklar. Bana kalsa hepsini kamçılatırdım! Akıllarını başlarına getirmek şart. Alayını hizaya sokmak lazım yoksa bu gemi olduğu yerde sayar. Daha da kötüsü, bir yere gider de orası istediğimiz yer olmaz."
languages.original_text: "There are too many to list them all. Tech-Priests from the enginarium, voidsmen from the augur decks, the work-shy fools on the bridge. I'd have every last one of them flogged! They all need a wake-up call. They need to be whipped into shape or else this ship'll be going nowhere. Or even worse, it'll go somewhere we don't want it to."

traits.locale_text: "Say say bitmez. Mühendishanedeki Tekno Rahipler, alamet güvertelerindeki uçsuz erleri, köprüdeki kaytarıcı ahmaklar. Bana kalsa hepsini kamçılatırdım! Akıllarını başlarına getirmek şart. Alayını hizaya sokmak lazım yoksa bu gemi olduğu yerde sayar. Daha da kötüsü, bir yere gider de orası istediğimiz yer olmaz."
